TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpSessionStateContainer extends System.Object implements class System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState

summary.span: Contains session-state values as well as session-level settings for the current request.

span.span: Contains session-state values as well as session-level settings for the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了会话状态管理，使你可以存储多个请求间关联与唯一的浏览器会话的信息。ASP.NET provides session-state management to enable you to store information associated with a unique browser session across multiple requests. 您可以存储值引用键的名称或数字索引的集合。You can store a collection of values referenced by a key name or by numerical index. 会话值和功能的访问权限是可使用类，该类可通过访问属性与当前或属性。Access to session values and functionality is available using the class, which is accessible through the property of the current or the property of the . 类访问会话状态的值和会话级别设置，通过引用的会话状态容器，这是一种实现的接口已填充了会话状态数据并添加到的当前请求的会话状态模块的通过。The class accesses session-state values and session-level settings by referencing a session-state container, which is an implementation of the interface that has been populated with session-state data and added to the of the current request by the session-state module for the . 类调用类，该类管理会话设置和值位于内存中的。The class calls the class, which manages session settings and values in memory. 类是 ASP.NET 实现接口。The class is the ASP.NET implementation of the interface. 类不应在应用程序代码中调用。The class is not intended to be called from application code. 如果您替换与自定义会话状态模块，可以使用类，或提供您自己的实现的接口。If you replace the with a custom session-state module, you can use the class, or supply your own implementation of the interface. ## Examples 有关使用自定义会话状态模块的示例类作为当前请求的会话状态容器，请参阅类概述。For an example of a custom session-state module that uses the class as the session-state container for the current request, see the class overview.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件处理程序填充新的自定义会话状态模块新的或现有的会话信息一起对象，并将其添加到的当前请求使用方法。The following code example shows the event handler for a custom session-state module that populates a new object with new or existing session information and adds it to the of the current request using the method. 自定义会话状态模块的完整代码示例，请参阅类概述。For a full code example of a custom session-state module, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法标记属性设置为`true`。The method of the marks the property as `true`. 然后可以查询自定义会话模块属性，并删除会话信息，如果属性是`true`。A custom session module can then query the property and remove the session information if the property is `true`.

summary.span: Gets or sets the character-set identifier for the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符集 （代码页） 用于解释多字节字符数据，确定的字符值，并因此排序顺序。A character set (code page) is used to interpret multibyte character data, determining character value, and therefore sort order. 代码页设置仅应用于多字节字符数据，不为 Unicode 字符数据。Code-page settings apply only to multibyte character data, not to Unicode character data. 这属性提供为了与 ASP 的早期版本仅兼容。This property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果不需要保持与 ASP 页面向后的兼容性，使用属性改为。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供为了与 ASP 的早期版本仅兼容。The property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果不需要保持与 ASP 页面向后的兼容性，使用属性改为。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead. ASP.NET 不在会话状态中存储的区域设置标识符。ASP.NET does not store the locale identifier in session state. 属性访问属性来获取和设置的标识符。The property accesses the property to get and set the identifier.
